metadata.name: Blue Eye Gargoylz
metadata.description:
This Special Nanoz is part of the Halloween 2022 Lore "The Gargoylz Awakening".

A long time ago, after an exhausting battle, three brave Knights regained control of the Nanzacur Castle.

To celebrate the victory, they invited all villagers to a great feast. They laughed and danced through the night.

At dawn, as they were leaving the banquet room to go rest, Carnaloz the Dark Mage, appeared through a cloud of smoke in front of their eyes. Before they could reach their swords, Carnaloz cast a spell and the three Knights were changed into stone Gargoylez.

It was on the 31st night of October of the year 3 A.P. (After Primalz). To this day, the legend says that every year during Halloween night the Gargoylz awaken for a few hours and and can be seen flying around Nanzacurâ€™s dungeon.
